excerpt: A delicious vegan wrap filled with crunchy falafel and fresh veggies.

instructions.name: Make the Falafel
instructions: In a food processor, pulse chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, coriander, and salt until well combined but still a little chunky.
Transfer mixture to a bowl and add flour, mixing well.
Heat oil in a deep skillet over medium-high heat.
Fry falafel until golden brown, turning occasionally. Remove from skillet and drain on paper towels.

instructions.name: Make the wrap
instructions: Warm tortillas in a pan or microwave for a few seconds.
Add lettuce, tomato, cucumber, and red onion to each tortilla.
Top each tortilla with 4 falafel balls.
Roll each tortilla tightly into a wrap and serve immediately.
